column4: I am trying to get sounds working in Empathy.  Added the PPA, refreshed and updated.  Several packages were updated, but the sound wasn't fixed and now I have the Empathy icon in the notification applet  and not the messaging applet.   Is there an easy way to fix this?
try getting alsa utils to play out samples.. if that works then the might be empathy.. sound should be heard at least with aplay
rhythmbox, mythtv and VLC play fine, as far as I can tell it is only Empathy.  I'll look into aplay, not familiar with it, thanks
in that case see what empathy is set to.. the aplay(alsa test tools) is used for testing if sound works at all.. u said sound works but just empathy.. so must be something about empathy
